data.body: Scene sessions currently instruct Claude to enter plan mode, stop, and wait for execution follow-up. This causes frequent stalls when subagents remain in planning loops. Update scene/prompt flow so execution starts immediately from parent/context, with explicit instructions to spawn subagents, use dedicated worktrees, and commit/push to origin/main without PR unless requested.
